job.title: Software Engineer c# .Net (with Azure)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtProject DescriptionltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTax and Accounting group within the client The mission of this engagement is to improve reliability availability and performance of the flagship produce  CCH AxcessltpgtltpgtAxcess is a product suite made out of number of products that serve the accounting clients ltpgtltpgtThe clients of company that use this product are the accountants and accounting firmsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt Perform analysis and Design transform highlevel design into lowlevel design and implementationltligtltligt To collaborate with an agile team that is passionate about utilizing emerging technologies and delivering high quality and timely codeltligtltligt Good understanding and experience following design patterns testdriven development and continuous integration practicesltligtltligt Build automated scalable services and systems to power our growing Azure cloud infrastructureltligtltligt Software prototyping and construction  Design Build and Modify existing business tier components Web applications and database objects using Microsoft platform technologies NET Web API and Azureltligtltligt Work with Quality Assurance Team on issue reporting resolution and change controlltligtltligt Support and Troubleshooting  Assist Operations Team with any environment issues during application deployment across Development QA Staging and Production environmentsltligtltligt Assist other cross teams with troubleshooting problems that may arise from applications or integration of various componentsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtSkills DescriptionltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtC Net ASP Net TFS Git Cloud Experience Azure GCP AWS Solid experience building REST APIsltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
